unnormalised: New Delhi: Preparations are underway for the annual Diwali Mela at Select Citywalk Mall, Saket. The event, scheduled to commence on 28/10/2024, is anticipated to draw significant crowds. Organizers project attendance to exceed 50,000 visitors throughout the 5-day festival.
normalised: New Delhi: Preparations are underway for the annual Diwali Mela at Select Citywalk Mall, Saket. The event, scheduled to commence on twenty eighth October two thousand and twenty four, is anticipated to draw significant crowds. Organizers project attendance to exceed fifty thousand visitors throughout the five day festival.

unnormalised: The Diwali Mela will feature over 200 stalls showcasing traditional handicrafts, festive attire, and culinary delights. Noteworthy performances are slated for each evening, starting at 7:00 PM IST. Security measures are being implemented to ensure the safety and comfort of all attendees.
normalised: The Diwali Mela will feature over two hundred stalls showcasing traditional handicrafts, festive attire, and culinary delights. Noteworthy performances are slated for each evening, starting at seven zero zero P-M I-S-T. Security measures are being implemented to ensure the safety and comfort of all attendees.

unnormalised: Traffic management plans are in place to mitigate congestion in the surrounding areas. Authorities advise commuters to anticipate delays, particularly between the hours of 4:00 PM and 10:00 PM. Shuttle services will operate from designated parking zones to the mall entrance.
normalised: Traffic management plans are in place to mitigate congestion in the surrounding areas. Authorities advise commuters to anticipate delays, particularly between the hours of four zero zero P-M and ten zero zero P-M. Shuttle services will operate from designated parking zones to the mall entrance.

unnormalised: The Mela will conclude on 01/11/2024. The timings for the event are 11:00 AM to 11:00 PM daily. The organizers have also announced a special "kids zone" that will be open from 12:00 PM to 8:00 PM.
normalised: The Mela will conclude on first November two thousand and twenty four. The timings for the event are eleven zero zero A-M to eleven zero zero P-M daily. The organizers have also announced a special "kids zone" that will be open from twelve zero zero P-M to eight zero zero P-M.
